user_query: My friends and I are planning a trip to India and we want to stay updated on the COVID-19 situation. Can you provide us with the latest updates on the pandemic? Also, fetch the details of confirmed cases, recovered cases, and deaths in each state. Additionally, give us the information about the gas fee funding wallets for donations.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest COVID-19 updates for India.
Get detailed COVID-19 statistics for confirmed cases, recovered cases, and deaths in each state of India.
Retrieve information regarding gas fee funding wallets for donations.
